nodes.excerpt: SaaSync retrieves invoices and other data from QBO or Xero. This data is transformed ready for use with ChartMogul. Data that can't be automatically synced appears in a review screen where SaaSync users can edit it before pushing remaining data to ChartMogul.

nodes.excerpt: The app calculates well-known SaaS metrics from your subscriptions data in Google Sheets. Prepare your data in a recognized format.
